name: Zombie Prototype
description:
This game is a prototype inspired heavily by Dead Ops Arcade. 

There are 5 Levels to be found.

Press [M] in the main menu to enter the Dev Room.

This project has been shelved but if you enjoyed it please check out https://ilick.itch.io/boxy-zombies , which is the product of what was learned from this project but with online multiplayer!
